1.description: <0>Welcome to Refined Itsukara.link!</0> This website is <3>unofficial</3> redesign of the schedular <6>Itsukara.link</6> offered by <9>Nijisanji </9>a Virtual Youtubers Network. Let me show you how to use!
1.title: Getting started

2.description: In the centre of the screen, you can see <2>past and upcoming streams</2>. You can tap to open the stream on YouTube. <6></6>You can also back and forth the timetable <9>by scrolling horizontally</9> (if you’re using from desktop, hold shift and spin the wheel).
2.title: Checking live streams

3.description: The advantage of Refined Itsukara.link is <2>not just the design</2>.<4></4>We also have a page which makes us possible to <7>explore streams by a streamer or a collaboration</7>. Try it out when there are too many streams to find the desired one!
3.title: Streamers and Collabs

4.description: Of course, we have <1>search feature</1> too. By typing a keyword, you can search for <6>categories, streamers, collaborations, streams</6> so that you will not miss your favourite stream.
4.title: Search

5.description: Did you get how to use it? Send questions, feature requests, improvements, and bug reports GitHub (<3>neet/refined-itsukara-link</3>)!<5></5>The project is open source software and we are looking for contributors who can implement better! Enjoy!
5.title: Contribution

performers.description: List of streamers that belongs to Nijisanji
performers.title: Performers

search.title: Type keywords to search for activities, streamers, categories etc
